sections.title: Warpriest (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Warpriest class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiencies (Warpriest)
sections.description: Grants proficiency with all simple and martial weapons, the deity's favored weapon, all armor types except tower shields, and Improved Unarmed Strike if the deity's favored weapon is unarmed strike.

sections.title: Spell Casting (Divine) (Warpriest)
sections.description: Allows casting divine spells from the cleric spell list up to 6th level, with Wisdom-based preparation and spontaneous casting of cure or inflict spells based on alignment.

sections.title: Aura (Ex) (Warpriest)
sections.description: Grants a powerful aura corresponding to the deity's alignment that can be detected by spells like detect evil, similar to a cleric's aura.

sections.title: Blessings (Su) (Warpriest)
sections.description: Grants two domain-based blessings from the warpriest's deity, each providing minor and major powers usable a limited number of times per day.

sections.title: Focus Weapon (Warpriest)
sections.description: Grants Weapon Focus as a bonus feat at 1st level, which can be chosen for any weapon regardless of the deity's favored weapon.

sections.title: Sacred Weapon (Su) (Warpriest)
sections.description: Allows weapons with Weapon Focus to deal scaling damage based on warpriest level and be enhanced with magical properties as a swift action for limited rounds per day.

sections.title: Bonus Languages (Warpriest)
sections.description: Adds Abyssal, Celestial, and Infernal to the warpriest's list of available bonus languages from high Intelligence.

sections.title: Fervor (Su) (Warpriest)
sections.description: Provides a pool of uses per day to heal allies, harm undead, or cast warpriest spells as swift actions with reduced casting requirements.

sections.title: Bonus Feats (Warpriest)
sections.description: Grants bonus combat feats every 3 levels, treating warpriest level as base attack bonus and fighter level for feat prerequisites.

sections.title: Channel Energy (Su) (Warpriest)
sections.description: Allows channeling positive or negative energy in a 30-foot burst by expending two fervor uses, healing allies or harming enemies based on alignment.

sections.title: Sacred Armor (Su) (Warpriest)
sections.description: Enhances worn armor with magical properties and enhancement bonuses as a swift action for limited minutes per day, and can activate sacred weapon simultaneously.

sections.title: Aspect of War (Su) (Warpriest)
sections.description: Once per day transformation that treats level as base attack bonus, grants DR 10/—, ignores armor speed penalties, and provides unlimited blessing uses for 1 minute.

sections.title: Hammer of God (Su) (Warpriest)
sections.description: Capstone ability that grants two additional blessings from the deity's list and increases daily blessing uses by 2.
